definitions.title: vb. quadril. interpret, translate
definitions.body: (As. targumânu, interpreter (so also TelAm.), perh. from √ [[רגם]], cf. rajama, conjecture, opine We:Reste Arab.Heid. 207, v. also Dl:HWB 718 Vollers:ZA xii. 138; NH = BH; Aram. [[תַּרְגֵּם]],targem, Ar. tarjama);—Pt. pass. [[מְתֻרְגׇּם]] Ez Eze 4:7.—On Targum v. Walker:Hast. DB s.v.
